name: Rugosi
description: Rugosi is a plain and little game in which you take the role to play through various challenging levels.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 (64-bit) Processor: 2.0 GHz - Dual core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.5 GHz - Triple core Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 MB available space
